net.sf.JRecord.Details

Interface IFieldValue

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractFieldValue
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    net.sf.JRecord.Details.fieldValue.FieldValue, FieldValue
    Deprecated. 
    use either AbstractFieldValue or IFieldValue

    public interface IFieldValue
extends AbstractFieldValue
    Extended FieldValue interface for us in JRecord. It mainly contains high/low value methods
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

      • isFieldInRecord

        boolean isFieldInRecord()
        Deprecated. 
        For Cobol Records it checks wether a field in a Occurs-Depending array is actually there (i.e. wether the index < current-Max-Index).
        Returns:
        wether the line is actually valid for this Record. For Cobol Lines it checks the status of Fields in an Occurs-Depending
